objects.text:
• Premium quality green glass
• Crystal-clear wine glass included
• Thick base & durable construction
• Perfect for collectors & enthusiasts

objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 320 60'><rect x='0' y='0' width='70' height='60' rx='5' fill='#5E0A0A' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2'/><text x='35' y='34' font-family='Arial' font-size='28' fill='#FFFFFF' text-anchor='middle'>23</text><text x='35' y='52' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#FFFFFF' text-anchor='middle'>HOURS</text><rect x='80' y='0' width='70' height='60' rx='5' fill='#5E0A0A' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2'/><text x='115' y='34' font-family='Arial' font-size='28' fill='#FFFFFF' text-anchor='middle'>59</text><text x='115' y='52' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#FFFFFF' text-anchor='middle'>MINUTES</text><rect x='160' y='0' width='70' height='60' rx='5' fill='#5E0A0A' stroke='#D4AF37' stroke-width='2'/><text x='195' y='34' font-family='Arial' font-size='28' fill='#FFFFFF' text-anchor='middle'>47</text><text x='195' y='52' font-family='Arial' font-size='12' fill='#FFFFFF' text-anchor='middle'>SECONDS</text></svg>

product_details.name: Elegant Green Glass Wine Bottle & Stemware Set - Perfect for Wine Enthusiasts
product_details.description:
• Premium quality green glass wine bottle with classic design
• Includes matching crystal-clear wine glass with elegant stem
• Bottle features thick base and durable construction
• Traditional wine glass design with balanced proportions
• Perfect for wine storage and sophisticated serving
• Ideal for restaurants, home bars, and wine collectors
• Bottle height approximately 12 inches, glass height 6 inches
• Timeless green tint adds vintage aesthetic appeal
• Professional-grade glassware suitable for daily use
• Makes an excellent gift for wine connoisseurs

banner_details:
This banner design features a luxurious and elegant aesthetic focused on a premium wine bottle set. The layout consists of a multi-line heading (`heading`) in a serif gold font that enhances the product's prestige. Below that, the `subheading` uses a clean sans-serif font to introduce the product. A gold accent line (`decorative_line`) separates the bold heading from the detailed points (`description`), which are arranged with bullet points for clarity. A bright attention-grabbing tagline (`urgency_tagline`) is followed by supportive text (`urgency_subtext`) to build urgency. A boxed countdown timer (`countdown_timer`) adds to the sense of urgency with a label (`countdown_label`) below. The `price` is prominently featured in bold golden text. The `cta_button` paired with `cta` encourages immediate purchase with a high-contrast black-on-gold style. On the right side, the `product_image` of a green glass wine bottle and glass dominates, adding a sleek and premium look to the design.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Burgundy (#4A0404, #5E0A0A)
- Forest Green (#1A3212, #224019)
- Rich Gold (#D4AF37, #AA8521)
- Bright Red (#FF6B6B)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
- Jet Black (#000000)
product_color: The product image showcases a refined wine bottle and glass against a clean, white background, emphasizing a minimalistic and elegant aesthetic. The primary colors used are deep forest green (#1E2B20) from the bottle, charcoal black (#2F2F2F) from shadows and contours, light smoke gray (#D8D8D8) from highlights and reflections, and a subtle metallic silver (#B0B0B0) along the glass edges. The green is subtly blended into the transparent body, highlighted by soft gradients and reflections. For an advertisement banner, a classy palette with these hues creates a luxurious atmosphere: Forest Green (#1E2B20), Smoke Gray (#D8D8D8), Charcoal (#2F2F2F), Silver (#B0B0B0) and White (#FFFFFF).
